verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> came אַנְשֵׁ֣י ׀ <WH376> and the men קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֗ים <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> and fetched up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <WH935> and brought אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> it into the house אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <WH41> of Abinadab בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1389> in the hill וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> Eleazar בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son קִדְּשׁ֔וּ <WH6942> and sanctified לִשְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become מִיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> And it came to pass while שֶׁ֤בֶת <WH3427> abode הָֽאָרוֹן֙ <WH727> the ark בְּקִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <WH7157> in Kirjathjearim וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ <WH7235> was long הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> that the time וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <WH1961> it was עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> for it was twenty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיִּנָּה֛וּ <WH5091> lamented כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto all the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> If בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <WH3824> with all your hearts אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you שָׁבִים֙ <WH7725> If ye do return אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הָסִ֜ירוּ <WH5493> [then] put away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָ֛ר <WH5236> the strange מִתּוֹכְכֶ֖ם <WH8432> from among וְהָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <WH6252> and Ashtaroth וְהָכִ֨ינוּ <WH3559> you and prepare לְבַבְכֶ֤ם <WH3824> your hearts אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD וְעִבְדֻ֣הוּ <WH5647> and serve לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> alone וְיַצֵּ֥ל <WH5337> him only and he will deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> you out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיָּסִ֙ירוּ֙ <WH5493> did put away בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Then the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <WH1168> Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעַשְׁתָּרֹ֑ת <WH6252> and Ashtaroth וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel קִבְצ֥וּ <WH6908> Gather אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> all Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4709> Mitspah וְאֶתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> and I will pray בַּעַדְכֶ֖ם <WH1157> about אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> for you unto the LORD

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> And they gathered together הַ֠מִּצְפָּתָה <WH4709> to Mizpeh וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <WH7579> and drew מַ֜יִם <WH4325> water וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכ֣וּ ׀ <WH8210> and poured [it] out לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיָּצ֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6684> and fasted בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and said שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> there We have sinned לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֧ט <WH8199> judged שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> Mizpah

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> And when the Philistines כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> were gathered together בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֔תָה <WH4709> to Mizpah וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> went up סַרְנֵֽי־ <WH5633> the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אֶל־ <WH413> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַֽיִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> heard בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּֽרְא֖וּ <WH3372> [it] they were afraid מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> of פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> the Philistines

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> to Samuel אַל־ <WH408> not תַּחֲרֵ֣שׁ <WH2790> Cease מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at מִזְּעֹ֖ק <WH2199> not to cry אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <WH3467> for us that he will save מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> us out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> And Samuel טְלֵ֤ה <WH2924> lamb חָלָב֙ <WH2461> sucking אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> a [וַיַּעֲלֶה כ] (וַיַּעֲלֵ֧הוּ <WH5927> arise ק) עוֹלָ֛ה <WH5930> [it for] a burnt offering כָּלִ֖יל <WH3632> wholly לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּזְעַ֨ק <WH2199> cried שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <WH8050> and Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for Israel וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֖הוּ <WH6030> heard יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And as Samuel מַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> was offering up הָעוֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <WH6430> the Philistines נִגְּשׁ֔וּ <WH5066> drew near לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיַּרְעֵ֣ם <WH7481> thundered יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> but the LORD בְּקוֹל־ <WH6963> thunder גָּ֠דוֹל <WH1419> with a great בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֤וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> against פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> upon the Philistines וַיְהֻמֵּ֔ם <WH2000> and discomfited וַיִּנָּגְפ֖וּ <WH5062> them and they were smitten לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <WH3318> went out אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> out הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> of Mizpeh וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> and pursued אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּכּ֕וּם <WH5221> and smote עַד־ <WH5704> far מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Thahash לְבֵ֥ית כָּֽר׃ <WH1033> them until [they came] under Bethcar

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> Then Samuel אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone אַחַ֗ת <WH259> a וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> and set בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between הַמִּצְפָּה֙ <WH4709> [it] between Mizpeh וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַשֵּׁ֔ן <WH8129> and Shen וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> the name אֶ֣בֶן הָעָ֑זֶר <WH72> of it Ebenezer וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> saying עַד־ <WH5704> far הֵ֖נָּה <WH2008> Thus עֲזָרָ֥נוּ <WH5826> helped יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Hitherto hath the LORD

וַיִּכָּֽנְעוּ֙ <WH3665> were subdued הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> So the Philistines וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and they יָסְפ֣וּ <WH3254> no more ע֔וֹד <WH5750> anymore לָב֖וֹא <WH935> and they came בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> into the coast יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become יַד־ <WH3027> and the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> was against the Philistines כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> of Samuel

וַתָּשֹׁ֣בְנָה <WH7725> were restored הֶעָרִ֡ים <WH5892> And the cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לָֽקְחוּ־ <WH3947> had taken פְלִשְׁתִּים֩ <WH6430> which the Philistines מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <WH3478> from Israel לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> to Israel מֵעֶקְר֣וֹן <WH6138> from Ekron וְעַד־ <WH5704> even גַּ֔ת <WH1661> even unto Gath וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלָ֔ן <WH1366> and the coasts הִצִּ֥יל <WH5337> deliver יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> thereof did Israel מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> there was שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> And there was peace בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> between Israel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> and the Amorites
וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <WH8199> judged שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> of his life

וְהָלַ֗ךְ <WH1980> And he went מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> from שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year בְּשָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> to year וְסָבַב֙ <WH5437> in circuit בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> to Bethel וְהַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> and Gilgal וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> and Mizpeh וְשָׁפַט֙ <WH8199> and judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקוֹמ֖וֹת <WH4725> in all those places הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וּתְשֻׁבָת֤וֹ <WH8666> And his return הָרָמָ֙תָה֙ <WH7414> [was] to Ramah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> for there [was] his house וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there שָׁפָ֣ט <WH8199> and there he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיִּֽבֶן־ <WH1129> and there he built שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ
